text: The Spießhorn is a mountain, high, in the Black Forest just east of the Herzogenhorn. The summit is on the boundary between St. Blasien and Bernau im Schwarzwald. The Spießhorn is largely forested. At the summit is an observation pavilion. To the southwest is a subpeak, the Kleines Spießhorn. == References == == External links == Category:One-thousanders of Germany Category:Mountains and hills of the Black Forest Category:Mountains and hills of Baden-Württemberg Category:St. Blasien
title: Spießhorn
